General.Name: Detskiy Mir PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Detsky Mir, a multi-format retailer, operates a chain of children's goods retail stores. The company offers toys, products for newborns, apparel and footwear, art and craft sets, recreational goods, car seats, furniture, and stationery, as well as pet goods. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
